scripts.start: echo ⚠️  Please open TWO terminals: Terminal 1: 'npm run dev:backend' ^| Terminal 2: 'npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.dev: echo ⚠️  Please open TWO terminals: Terminal 1: 'npm run dev:backend' ^| Terminal 2: 'npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
